artist: Artist: Ōkura Kōtō; Publisher: Kimura Toyokichi
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; single figure of a soldier running on the deck of a ship, surrounded by explosions; black sky with crashing waves and large plumes of white smoke; faint smoky image of the rail of the ship in the left image
inscription: on right sheet, on back, in LLC: IWZ 03123965
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper with mica
title: God of War, Our Naval Commander Hirose Takeo
